title: Streamers will they kill or grow this sport?
body:
So I just wanted to get the opinion of the community on the subject of streaming?   Will it kill the future of this game or will it keep it relevant and alive?

 My opinion is that Streamers will kill this sport.  I think the esport aspect is amazing and I love watching anything that Riot puts out there.  I also love content from companies like proguides, mobalytics,etc that give great content on how to improve.   

But twitch streamers which i would say used to be good and provided good content have what I would call become the soap opera of league of legends.  
Or maybe even better is they provide a Jerry Springer type entertainment.  I dont think it is good for the community.  I think it teaches kids especially the younger kids that they can be toxic and get away with it because there favorite streamer is as well.  


Thoughts?
